name: DENTAL_VISIT_INFO
description: The DENTAL_VISIT_INFO table contains information associated with dental visit records.

columns.name: REGIMEN_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the visit record for this row.

columns.name: VISIT_TREATMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the treatment that contains a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_SPACING_DAYS
columns.description: The requested number of days between scheduled visits.

columns.name: VISIT_SCHE_INSTRUCT
columns.description: The scheduling instructions for a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_APPT_LENGTH
columns.description: The requested appointment length for a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_APPOINTMENT
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) for the appointment that is linked to a visit.

columns.name: VISIT_ORDER_NUMBER
columns.description: The relative order of a visit within the containing treatment.

columns.name: DENT_SCHED_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: Indicates the scheduling status of a visit

columns.name: DENT_REQ_DATE
columns.description: Date requested by provider to schedule visit

columns.name: DENT_VISIT_TYPE_ID
columns.description: The dental visit's requested visit type for scheduling

columns.name: DENT_VISIT_PROV_ID
columns.description: The dental visit's requested provider for scheduling

columns.name: DENT_VISIT_DEPT_ID
columns.description: Department in which to schedule the visit

columns.name: DENT_VIS_PROVTYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Requested provider type for dental visit

columns.name: VISIT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the dental visit.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient (EPT) ID for the patient that the dental visit is associated with

columns.name: REFERRAL_ORDER_ID
columns.description: Linked referral order (ORD) for a dental visit.

columns.name: APPT_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of the linked appointment request.

columns.name: READY_FOR_SCHED_YN
columns.description: Stores whether this visit should appear in scheduling workflows.
